entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build coreclr/libs components needed by test build #89146
  • .NET 8 AOT: Internal.TypeSystem.TypeSystemException+FileNotFoundException: Failed to load assembly 'Microsoft.Extensions.Features' #89141
  • Explore ThreadSanitizer testing #89138
    Future
  • Enable AddressSanitizer on ARM64 #89137
    Future
  • Add UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer test legs to runtime-sanitized #89136
    Future
  • Enable AddressSanitizer on Windows #89134
    9.0.0
  • Enable Use-After-Return detection in AddressSanitizer #89133
  • Enable AddressSanitizer testing for Mono #89132
  • nativeaot/GenerateUnmanagedEntryPoints test fails under ASAN #89131
    Future
  • Dotnet 7 can not work with openssl 1.1.1f #89126
  • Loader\classloader\StaticVirtualMethods\RegressionTests\GetInterfaceMapWithStaticVirtualsAndConstraints fails in NativeAOT #89122
  • ARM64 Real World - Roslyn #89119
  • SSL RemoteCertificateNameMismatch when targeting net8.0 #89118
  • Scoped service should not be resolvable from root provider #89109
  • Generic method static virtuals with default implementation behaves fails to compile #89101
  • [mono] Support UnsafeAccessorAttribute method calls with custom modifiers #89098
    8.0.0
  • [HttpRequestError] Handle HTTP/3 cases better if needed #89097
    8.0.0
  • [HttpRequestError] Detect NameResolutionError more reliably #89096
    8.0.0
  • [HttpRequestError] Map QUIC errors to HttpRequestError if possible #89095
    8.0.0
  • Half.TryParse assertion failure on System.Globalization.Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCaseUtf8_Scalar #89094
  • Adjust Networking metrics to follow OpenTelemetry semantic conventions #89093
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] Long running test: SslStreamMemoryConformanceTests.ReadWrite_Success_Large #89092
  • Include info about system call errors in exceptions from creating/opening a named mutex #89090
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketAsyncEventArgsTest.Finalizer_InvokedWhenNoLongerReferenced #89089
  • HttpClient.SendAsync throws System.ObjectDisposedException on Android #89086
  • [6.0] [mono] [linux] Conole test failure SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd #89084
  • [Mono]: test_0_ldvirtftn_generic_method in generics.cs crash in Full AOT + Interp mode. #89076
  • icudt_EFIGS.dat blocked by firewall #89073
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #89104
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regressions in System.Collections.Sort<IntStruct> #89106
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 20 Regressions on 7/12/2023 7:15:00 AM #89103
  • NETCore.App and AspNetCore.App versions mismatch #89070
  • [mono] Make mono aot-compiler a tool pack in the Sdk #89067
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Revisit HttpRequestException.HttpRequestError type #89080
    8.0.0
  • Generics are assumed to be nullable types and lose nullable annotations. #89143
  • Provide "Left Handed" overloads of matrix create functions #80332
  • [mono][hotreload] Adding a new field didn't work #86172
    8.0.0
  • Explore ways to reduce Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler size #75468
    8.0.0
  • COMHost/ComActivator without separate AssemblyLoadContext #66013
    8.0.0
  • Regex should explicitly target IndexOfAnyExcept(char {, char, char}) when handling non-ASCII vectorized sets #84150
    8.0.0
  • Unable to get exception's filename and line number in mono. #85223
  • Add an easier way of opening named keys via OpenSSL #55356
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Text.Json built-in support for more numeric types #87994
    8.0.0
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger: Add/Subtract performance can be improved when size of arguments are different #83457
    8.0.0
  • Support unboxing a true nullable and opt-in to faster emitted IL invoke stubs #88952
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Tests failing due to TypeInfoResolver not providing JsonTypeInfo metadata for a type #88982
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver.RootDefaultInstance #89113
  • Frequent WebSocket Compression Segfault #86960
    8.0.0
  • System.Formats.Tar.Tests.TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests.WriteEntry_LongFileSize times out on Mono #88777
  • [API Proposal]: Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #64427
    8.0.0
  • `Trace.Assert` does not indicate that a nullable refernece type is not null #88939
    8.0.0
  • Tier0 allocates on a simple cast (boxing) #88987
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Revisit exceptions in Quic #82262
    8.0.0
  • QuicListener AcceptConnectionAsync and OperationCanceledException #78096
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded timed out #88868
  • [browser][blazor] Unexpected files in publish folder #88142
    8.0.0
  • Better behavior for `dotnet --version` with global.json #38097
    8.0.0
  • Update global.json default SDK roll-forward behaviour #77614
    8.0.0
  • Compiler crashes when failing to release Mutex #53420
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] Native AoT - HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded #89087
  • [6.0] CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.NumberFormatInfoMiscTests.DigitSubstitutionListTest(cultureName: "prs", shape: NativeNational) expected Context #86338
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] Globalization CultureInfoConstructor.Ctor_String failures #88740
    7.0.x
  • [QUIC] Surface transport error code in QuicException #72666
    8.0.0
  • HttpProtocolException is not reported properly on initial HTTP/2 settings handshake failure #82168
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support error codes for HttpRequestException #76644
    8.0.0
  • Adding more information and events to System.Net.Http telemetry #85729
    8.0.0
  • How to get the socket information from HttpClient request? #63159
    8.0.0
  • Make non-file URL support optional in XmlUrlResolver #83495
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT application linking with external static library or object files #89044
    Future
  • other than mscv in window, is there any way to compile nativeaot #89069
  • [iOS][MacCatalyst] error: mono_coop_cond_broadcast Cannot transition thread from STATE_BLOCKING with DO_BLOCKING #88405
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix failures around blittable collections with [Out] and chars #89149
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Avoid generating internal static classes with constant names in Options Source gen #89148
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix TestGenericAddStaticField #89145
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-author-action, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Include TypeNameBuilder.cs from CoreLib instead of copying the file over #89144
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono] Register static rgctx trampolines in the JIT info tables. #89142
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use SearchValues for non-ASCII Regex fallback #89140
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Generate an 'out' local variable for unmanaged to managed stubs when the value needs to be marshalled out to unmanaged #89139
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [PERF] Finish fixing PerfBDNApp, continuation of #89057 #89135
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add FileAttributes.None #89130
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • adding clrgc variant with regions enabled #89129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix the default behavior to trim the RCW interop by default #89128
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix ILVerifier holding files open #89127
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Disable the "casts between generated and built-in COM interop" analyzer when the "enable interop between generated COM interop and built-in COM interop" feature is enabled. #89125
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Use script instead of powershell to set DOTNET_ROOT #89123
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose `MarkStep.ScopeStack` #89120
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements #89117
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Avoid calling GC write barrier for byrefs [#89064 + more HasGCByRef logic] #89116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove feature exclude xml tests #89111
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Try enabling full trimming by default when not using blazor #89110
    area-Build-mono
  • Unbox a true nullable without Opcodes.Unbox #89108
    area-System.Reflection
  • Remove etw --exclude-feature tests. #89107
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Ensure last-use copy omission candidates are marked with GTF_GLOB_REF #89088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute xml documentation. #89082
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add Driver.Context setter #89081
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [WIP] Testing the fix for Linq.Expressions build #89078
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Avoid calling GC write barrier for byrefs #89064
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for default implementation of static virtuals with method constraints #89061
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr

Merged

  • React to HttpRequestError API changes #89124
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve GC pause counter naming #89052
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Expose the left-handed matrix creation APIs #88930
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [hot_reload] Check for added fields earlier in compute_class_bitmap #89121
    area-EnC-mono
  • Improve choice of IndexOfXx routine for some TryFindNextStartingPosition implementations #89099
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Light up Ascii.Equality.Equals and Ascii.Equality.EqualsIgnoreCase with Vector512 code path #88650
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • OpenSSL ENGINE support #88656
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Align HOST_TVOS/TARGET_TVOS defines with the rest of the repo #89085
    area-Build-mono
  • Reenable a test on iOS/tvOS/Browser that was disabled #89083
    area-System.Reflection
  • JSON: Add support for Int128, UInt128 and Half #88962
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Add more details in PlatformNotSupportedException #89112
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Use Span.CopyTo(Span) in BigInteger's add and subtract #83951
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix broken runtime tests build #89115
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable SxS workload manifests #88781
    area-Workloads
  • unroll byref struct copies #86820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable reflection in source gen tests and fix AOT testing. #89105
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements #89045
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Use NDK toolchain instead of CMake for library mode #88886
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Build the shim assemblies as part of libs.sfx #89005
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixing a concurrency bug in ManagedWebSocket which may cause memory corruption #87966
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold BOX+ISINST to null if possible #88989
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Nullable compilation on the Options source gen #88973
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Fix FailedRequests_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded #89047
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Fix treating dotnet.native.wasm as native asset during publish #89079
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Update script to replace the BDN version being used in the PerfBDN app #89057
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bump semver from 7.3.7 to 7.5.4 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #88833
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, javascript
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline #89091
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, perf-pipeline
  • [workloads] Add linux-arm64 support for wasm and wasi #89068
    area-Build-mono
  • [TestOnly] port test fixes #89063
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Disable GCStress for Deserialize due to 88618 #89072
    area-Serialization
  • Annotate Trace.Assert/Fail with [DoesNotReturn{If}] #89066
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement HttpRequestError #88974
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [aot] Build cross compilers targeting x64/x86 hosted on osx-arm64 #89027
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Improve text for OpenSsl primitives when OpenSSL is not available #89046
    area-System.Security
  • Dedup OnWriteResume between {ReadOnly}Memory converters #89049
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Extend SocketsHttpHandler Connection and Request telemetry #88853
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add NativeAOT runtime pack builds for osx x64/arm64 #89018
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix DevDiv_718151 test #88404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Revert "Fix binding logic for dictionaries with complex elements" #89071
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add switch: Do not resolve URLs by defaults for XML #84169
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement support for `UnsafeAccessor` in the trimmer #88268
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2224107 #89058
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable stackoverflowtester test for win-x86 #89062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Feedback on regex parser PR #89060
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [mini] Enter GC Unsafe mode in handle_signal_exception #88436
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove `#if NETCOREAPP` from test #89041
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • [TestOnly] port test fixes #89065
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization
  • fix pooled array leak #88810
    area-System.IO
  • Remove createdump's DAC dependency for the PAL for NativeAOT #88802
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary string allocations in Get/SetMsQuicParameter #89050
    area-System.Net.Quic

Updated

  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on store if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter or struct field #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up debugger attributes tests. #89011
    area-Debugger-mono, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Use utf conversions from minipal #89036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Support PublishAot in addition to RunAOTCompilation for doing Mono-based AOT #89015

  • DependencyGraphViewer: Feature add same window navigation for NodeForm #84542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [libs][iOS] Unify `System.Linq.Expression.dll` build for all platforms #88723
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt changes #88370
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix incorrect nativeaot event thread / sequence number on shutdown #88941
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize GetType with known type #87579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add package readme for obsolete .NET Standard 1.x packages #88911
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Poc: add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation

  • Avoid extra console write for clearing on Unix #89026
    area-System.Console
  • [mono][jit] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #88986
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix memory leaks for interpreted dynamic methods. #88892

  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix NaN canonicalization issue #88510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove size overflow checks from Align8 helpers #2345
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix an EH bug #2344

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix array allocators #2342
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325
    area-ManagedZLib
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement exception dispatch info support #2341
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [APICompat] AssemblyLoadErrors should not be saved as CompatDifference #34064
    Backlog

Closed

  • #next #33831
  • Allow specifying path to local SDK in global.json #33924
  • Consider adding `.idea` to gitignore #34050
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205

PullRequests

Created

  • Add separate warnings for settings that depend on illink pack #34077
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Add EnableGeneratedComInterfaceComImportInterop property to control the source-generated/built-in COM interop interaction feature switch. #34072
    Area-NetSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add .idea to .gitignore #34044
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set EnableRequestDelegateGenerator=true when PublishTrimmed=true #34022
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Keep TrimMode=partial for projects targeting .NET 7 or below #34030
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Default to RazorLangVersion 8.0 in .NET 8.0 #33756
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Switch the VM image of the macOS #33783
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support PublishAot in addition to RunAOTCompilation for doing Mono-based AOT #34051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Allow ref assignment for switch expressions #3326
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009

PullRequests

Created

  • Ref assignment switch expressions #7352
  • Update `ref readonly` parameters proposal #7350

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unindent doesn't work well in multi-line strings #69099
  • IDE0200 mis-fires, 'fixes' code to be defective #69094
    Backlog
  • Ensure HasAnonymousFunctionConversion returns without binding lambda body for explicitly-typed lambda #69093
  • error MSB4064: The "ReportIVTs" parameter is not supported by the "Csc" task loaded from assembly: Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CodeAnalysis #69092
  • Diagnostics are propagated from referenced compilation in tests #69084
  • No `modreq(In)` emitted for synthesized delegate `Invoke` method #69079
    17.8
  • Multiple distinct default values error incorrectly reported #69078
    Backlog
  • Merging CodeStyle and Features layers #69077
  • The "Include snippets when ?-Tab is typed after an identifier" option is displayed incorrectly, or is unclear, or doesn't work #69075

Closed

  • Generics are assumed to be nullable types and lose nullable annotations #69103
  • CS7038: Failed to emit module 'name': Unable to determine specific cause of the failure. #67258
    17.8
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33918.294 #69097
  • 'Create and assign [field|property]' does not work for primary constructor parameters #68817
  • Invalid refactoring suggestion for expression with int? when part of string interpolation #69087
  • False positive for CS8604 when using the logical XOR operator #69080
  • Update "propdp" snippet to use nameof #44551
    Backlog
  • Use a BitVector instead of bool[] in MethodTypeInferrer.FixParameters #56012
    Backlog
  • Disallow extension methods lookup on non-static or generic types #69051
  • Compiler doesn't tokenize surrogate pairs correctly #69041

PullRequests

Created

  • Address feedback on File types EE support #69102
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't offer to simplify lambdas if it would change semantics #69101
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pull request review policy update #69100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement `IsMoveableVariable` check for inline array element access. #69098
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Disallow declaring readonly, volatile, or fixed size buffer fields as element fields of an inline array type. #69096
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Remove tracking link to issue 44902 #69095
    Area-Compilers
  • Add missing IDE buddies to feature status page #69091
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, 17.8
  • Run ref safety analysis for field initializers on bound nodes transformed to assignments to the target fields. #69088
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Add support for IDE scenarios related to `ref readonly` parameters #69085
    Area-IDE, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Suppress `ref readonly` warning for extension method receiver #69083
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Remove remaining `ref readonly` prototype comments #69082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Enable Binskim scan in CI builds #69081
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix missing duplicate diagnostic for enum declarations #68967
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets - `svm` and `sim` snippets #68854
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #68772
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update 'initialize member from parameter' to work with primary constructors. #69072
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where we were offering an invalid coalesce (??) simplication #69089
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations of Location instances #68936
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Convert several other types over to being records. #69086
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify core lexing switch #69005
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Mark interceptors feature as merged #69090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move several value types over to being records #68956
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce bool array allocations in MethodTypeInferrer.FixParameters #69069
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce TypeWithAnnotations array allocations for code path that don't use them #69071
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Avoid giving 'no best type' error when one of the types contains error types #68991
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Remove extra logic to see if users are squatting on keywords #59086
    Area-IDE
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Rationalize how temporary directory works today #68226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Don't report CLS compliance warnings for attributes on inacessible types #68527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Relax ref readonly parameter signature matching #68680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Reduce allocations observed in local trace opening Roslyn.sln #68076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Fix internal compiler error when handling DynamicObjectCreationExpression #68030
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Flatten merged namespaces #67891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics, Backlog
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.8
  • List patterns: Avoid generating arbitrarily long pattern examples #66585
    Area-Compilers, Community, Backlog
  • List patterns: Trigger merging of values even if the precondition is already met #66692
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns, Backlog
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Backlog
  • Warn that a user-defined API on an inline array type won’t be used by the language for an element access expression #69064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, 17.8
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers, Backlog
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community, Backlog
  • Allow index initialisers to be used in fixed size buffers. #39805
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, Backlog
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Backlog
  • Track MemberNotNull for local functions #63310
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, Backlog
  • Allow default values for `ref readonly` parameters #69032
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Widen `RefKindVector` to hold `RefReadonlyParameter` #69034
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes documentation (VS2015 - VS2019) #69031
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Update CSharpErrorFactsGenerator to be a source generator #65192
    Area-Compilers, Community, Backlog
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve sequence point placement in primary constructors and records #68765
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Source generators/track values etw #68830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Consolidate Interlocked initialize implementations #69017
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localize C# Interactive window title #69066
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Find compatible substituted implicit extensions #68989
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875) #69065
  • Relax method conversions with ref readonly parameters #69020
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Reduce `HashSet<TypeWithAnnotations>` allocations in MethodTypeInferrer.Fix #69070
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions` allocations by caching them in AssemblySymbol #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pc active statements #69028
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Web App server prerender never sends response when component contains large `string` #49505
  • Add ``OnMounted`` component lifecycle event #49497
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json, json #49496
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49495
  • Render issue when mixing render modes in server-rendered page #49490
    8.0-preview7
  • Order of action filters is not respected when using synchronous and asynchronous filters #49488
  • Blazor server side not close WebSocket on iframe destroy. #49487
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.runtimeconfig.json specifies runtime properties which values should not bet set by a shared framework #49486
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32] MVCBlog is crashed with exception "Unable to resolve service for type 'XXX' while attempting to activate 'xxxController' #49485
  • Identity APIs return plain text response instead of Problem Details for missing fields #49483
  • Inconsistent refresh token field naming between /login and /refresh in Identity endpoints #49482
  • Refresh token invalidation upon security stamp update #49481
  • Perf regression: json, json, plaintext #49479
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #49478

Closed

  • EnableRequestDelegateGenerator by default for PublishTrimmed apps #48416
  • Perf improvement: json, updates #49250
  • Support components mutating SupplyParameterFromForm data #49442
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor EventCallback not being considered immutable thus making child components to be rendered again #49476
  • How does 'System.Web.Http' Compiles in .NET 7 Blazor server Application #49411
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Blazor Server with Microsoft Identity and Azure SignalR Using Multiple Hubs #49425
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #49277
  • Perf regression: mvc #49429
  • WebApi template remove UseMinimalAPIs option #49217
  • Multiple API template entry points should be reconciled #49047
    8.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more MapIdentityApi endpoints #49498
    area-identity
  • [Blazor] Support for determining the render mode dynamically #49477
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Web API templates updates #49501
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Remaining model binding work #49492
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Allow components to mutate [SupplyParameterFromForm] data #49489
    area-blazor, feature-full-stack-web-ui, 8.0-preview7
  • Sync shared code from runtime #49480
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • Update Wilson7 branch #49491
    area-security
  • API template updates #49394
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview7
  • Add support for explicit IParsable<T>.TryParse in RDF. #49317
    area-minimal, 8.0-preview7

Updated

  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor
  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Public API for interacting with runtime #49420
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview7
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #49470
    area-infrastructure
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • Option to use JsonWebTokenHandler in oidc handler #49333
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Tweak AddRazorPages trimming warning. #49377
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18

PullRequests

Created

  • Extend dotnet-gcdump support for mobile and dotnet-dsrouter scenarios. #4081

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Label with bound BackgroundColor does not work on Android #16220
  • [WiP] TabIndex/TabStop/Keyboard Traversal APIs #16218
  • [WiP] KeyboardGestureRecognizers #16217
  • Add `ToPlatform` extension methods for `PointerEventArgs` to retrieve platform events #16216
  • Add support for ModifierFlags on PointerGestureRecognizer (PointerEventArgs) #16214
  • [iOS] CollectionView does not handle content being manipulated. #16210
  • Title bar messes up on resize #16209
  • Exception "this element is not in a namescope" when using Setter with TargetName for VisualState = Normal #16208
  • [iOS/Blazor] `AllowInlineMediaPlayback` should be true by default #16207
    Backlog
  • The path output is wrong when we applied Matrix Transformation #16206
  • Visual studio crashing #16205
  • LineHeight, CharacterSpacing, TextDecorations property not working when Label is first displayed on iOS. #16204
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer does not raise Swiped event #16203

Closed

  • Layout View Resorting is breaking Windows Narrators ability to navigate through elements #6140
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Desktop platforms: Mouse and Keyboard classes or DependencyServices #3739
    .NET 8 GA
  • Key presses and key combinations on inputs and pages #3858
    .NET 8
  • Visual Studio 17.7.0 Preview 3 Android Not Attaching to Debugger #16212
  • invalid android:versionCode - Android app doesn't build in default .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid app #16155
  • XamlC compiler null-refs when encountering a binding to an array access #10396
    Backlog
  • DispatcherTimer reports itself as running after firing when IsRepeating is false #16171
    .NET 8 GA
  • Including specific android libraries via nuget causes AOT failures on RELEASE build #16074
  • MAUI BlazorWebView does not support backgroundcolor in iOS #16186
  • Mac Catalyst Picker is almost impossible to press #9786
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] Application.Current.OpenWindow not working #10603
    Backlog
  • Label not respecting Font Family setup if using FormattedText #16193
    Backlog
  • "Execution Failed" When trying to run app with iPhone simulator #15961
  • Invoking async swift code in an iOS binding library is returning an objective C encoding error #16199
  • Pages retained in memory when using DynamicResource Grid style #15986
  • .Net Maui 7 and 8 Preview Android Performing a full GC + Crash Collection View Back Forward #15860

PullRequests

Created

  • [Bug] Fix Grid cells not honoring MaxWidth #16215
  • Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16213

Merged

  • Make Add/Remove Logical public #16046
    area/layout 🔲, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮, area/FlyoutPage, area/modal, control-swipeview, area/ListView, control-border
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #16114
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [X] Compiled Bindings to Array #15944
    area/Xaml </>
  • Stop DispatcherTimer after Tick fires if IsRepeating is false #16173
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #16113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Android Ecosystem 20230714 net7.0 nuget bumps fix issue 16074 type renaming #16176
  • [controls] fix memory leak with Grid Row/ColumnDefinitions #16145
    layout-grid, memory-leak 💦

Updated

  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - MCT Popup Scrolling Fix #16201
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Revert default for UseSafeAreaProperty to value from .NET 6 for iOS #16093
    backport/suggested
  • Text needs to be set before other properties #16116
  • Move most controls to use ModifyMapping (and variants) #15058
  • Consolidate all the testing things #16200
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8.0 #16144
    8.0-preview7
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨

    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update entity using isModified = false do update the DB sometime #31295
  • [Q]: Why? `InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Int32' to type 'System.String'.` #31293
  • Add SQLite table rebuild code to migrations #31291

Closed

  • EFCore pulls latest packages from dotnet/runtime but LKG shared framework from the SDK #31300
    8.0.0-preview7
  • How to do a missing migration check in CI #26348
    8.0.0-preview7
  • Do we have EntityConverter that like ValueConverter? #31292
  • Code Analysis should also check for EF client side evaluation #31288

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Translate DEGREES and RADIANS #31301
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.55.0 #31296
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Bring in LinqToCSharpTranslator #31294
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.7 to 7.0.9 #31297
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.35.1 to 3.35.2 #31298
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [TINY] Use .NET 8.0 UnreachableException where appropriate #31299
  • API Review changes for complex types #31290
  • Target .NET 8 #31270
    auto-merge
  • Add `migrations has-pending-model-changes` Command #31164
    community-contribution
  • Fixes and cleanup around JSON collection SQL value conversions #31261
  • Added using existing collection for primitive collections not inside a JSON doc #31285
  • Uses existing JSON primitive collection instead of creating a new one #31282

Updated

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #31284
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Support querying over non-primitive JSON collections #31095
  • Part of JSON primitive collection serialization #31272
  • Fix to #30922 - Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #31263
  • [release/7.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 5.1.1 #31286
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.x] Perform alias uniquification in ExecuteUpdate setters #31208
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29572 - Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #31264
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • Add DateOnly.ToString / TimeOnly.ToString query mapping for SQL Server #31289

Closed

Created
